name: Procedural Gun Prototype
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim/fire

Spacebar - Pickup weapon

This was inspired by some good old Borderlands gameplay. I wanted to make a system that could assemble guns from a list of parts that affect how the weapon behaves. I took the opportunity to also try my hand at creating 2D assets, including a tile palette for the background. Everything in this project was created by me.
